subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ichiro Suzuki collected his 4,000th career hit in the first inning and the Yankees got a late home run from Alfonso Soriano to pull to four games back in the American League wild-card race.
snippet: Ichiro Suzuki collected his 4,000th career hit in the first inning and the Yankees got a late home run from Alfonso Soriano to pull to four games back in the American League wild-card race.
